General.Name: Net Insight AB Series B
General.Description: Net Insight AB (publ) offers media network solutions worldwide. The company offers managed network, and cloud and internet solutions, including production, distribution, and contribution under the Nimbra and Aperi names. It sells its products and services through its sales force and network partner. The company serves broadcasters, enterprises, service providers, content owners, and production companies. Net Insight AB (publ) was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Solna, Sweden.

4.Name: Ken  Graham
4.Title: Interim VP Resource Optimization and CTO
